name: CPGridTemplate
desc: A template that displays and manages a grid of items.

items.name: init(title: String?, gridButtons: [CPGridButton])
items.desc: Creates a grid template with a title and a set of buttons.

items.name: class CPGridButton
items.desc: A menu item button displayed on a grid template.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The title shown in the grid template's navigation bar.

items.name: var gridButtons: [CPGridButton]
items.desc: The array of grid buttons displayed on the template.
